inclusion.criterion: HBsAg in serum for at least 6 months
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Liver biopsy histology showing chronic hepatitis with or without cirrhosis
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: chronic inflammation compatible with a chronic viral hepatitis

inclusion.criterion: Previous therapy with alpha interferon without a lasting effect or intolerance to alpha interferon, due to side effects
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Group A: Absence of HBeAg from serum despite elevations in serum aminotransferases
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Group B: Proteinuria of greater than 1 gm per 24 hours for patients with glomerulonephritis
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Group C: Anti-HDV in serum and HDV antigen in liver biopsy or HDV RNA in serum and elevations in serum aminotransferases
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Group D: HBeAg and HBV DNA in serum but ineligibility to enter the multicenter trial of lamivudine
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant or if capable of bearing or fathering children must practice adequate contraception
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Significant systemic illnesses other than liver diseases, including congestive heart failure, renal failure, chronic pancreatitis, diabetes mellitus with poor control
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pre-existing bone marrow compromise: hematocrit must be greater than 30%, white blood cell count must be greater than 2000 mm(3), platelets must be greater than 70,000 mm(3)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Creatinine clearance must be greater than 50 cc/min
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: A history of clinically apparent pancreatitis or evidence of subclinically pancreatitis as shown by serum amylase values twice the upper limits of the normal range and abnormalities of the pancreas on computerized tomography or other imaging studies of the abdomen
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Irreversibly severe cirrhosis as defined by Child's stage C
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Presence of anti-HIV or anti-HCV with HCV RNA in serum
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Immunosuppressive therapy requiring use of more than 10 mg of prednisone (or its equivalent) per day
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Other antiviral therapy for chronic hepatitis B within the previous 3 months
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection, but no evidence of other significant systemic illnesses or pre-existing bone marrow compromise. He is on IFN and RBV combination therapy with direct antiviral drugs.
